pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mapping Data for 'usmap' Package // Provides a container for data used by the 'usmap' package. The data used by 'usmap' has been extracted into this package so that the file size of the 'usmap' package can be reduced greatly. The data in this package will be updated roughly once per year (plus bug fixes) as new shape files are provided by the US Census bureau.
